title: Looking for help with my ranked 10 game promos
body: Hey guys im 1/2 a level from 30 and would like any help getting silver + in my promos, well skype or cursed, and will que any role you need me in (ADC) is my worst.

replies.body: Dude DO NOT play ranked yet. Youre just turning lvl 30, you dont know how to play this game yet. A good rule of thumb is to not get into ranked until you have around 500 wins in normals. Trust me ive seen this 1000 times. Youll get placed in mid-low bronze and then come on here complaining about it. And everyone is gonna be like...see, we told you not to do it cuz you dont know how to play the game yet. You may think you do, but you dont. Dont be a in a rush to play ranked. Weve all seen it sooo many times...new player hits 30 and hops into ranked, gets placed bronze 4 and wonders how/why. B/c you dont know enough or understand everything you should. Strategies, concepts, intricacies of the game, knowing what every champion does and how they work, what to do and how to play against all of them. Just please wait man....i promise youll thank me and everyone like me who suggests you wait 1 year to get into ranked. Its a whole other world than what youre used too, everyone is better and knows all of these things im telling you about. Game knowledge is everything, youre too new to the game to have much of any

Dam you might be on to something.

If you went 7-3 and were placed in bronze it is because your account already had low mmr, likely because it was in bronze the season before. So those 10 games will not be representative of what you will play against in a fresh accounts first 10 games.

In your 10 promo games if you win them all and start 9-0, by the 10th one you are typically playing Plat 3/Plat 4 players on a brand new account. 

Treeofwar is correct, you are better off getting placed in an elo that you deserve, otherwise many games will just not be fun for you or the other people in the game.
